questions: What information is tracked in the tracker example?
answer:
## Tracker example
```javascript
 window.tracker.track('identification', {
  email: 'john.doe@example.com',
  firstname: 'John',
  lastname: 'Doe',
  phone: '123-456-7890',
  id: '123456',
  passport: 'ABC123',
  credit_card: '1111222233334444',
  coupon: 'DISCOUNT10',
  badge: 'VIP',
  twitter: '@johndoe',
  whatsapp: '1234567890',
  discord: 'johndoe#1234',
  slack: 'johndoe',
  telegram: '@johndoe',
  wechat: 'johndoe123',
  viber: '1234567890',
  signal: '1234567890'
});
```
